StreamlabsToken.label: Streamlabs Socket Token
StreamlabsToken.tooltip: The Streamlabs Socket Token. This can be found on the website via the left-hand side menu -> API Settings -> API Tokens.

OpenSLAPISettingsLink.label: Get your Socket Token here
OpenSLAPISettingsLink.tooltip: Click here to go to the Streamlabs API settings page

EnableFollow.label: Enable Follow Events
EnableFollow.tooltip: If checked, follow events will trigger the message

EnableSubscription.label: Enable Subscription Events
EnableSubscription.tooltip: If checked, subscription events will trigger the message

EnableCheer.label: Enable Cheer Events
EnableCheer.tooltip: If checked, cheer events will trigger the message

CheerMinimum.label: Minimum Cheer Amount
CheerMinimum.tooltip: Minimum number of bits to trigger the message

EnableDonation.label: Enable Donation Events
EnableDonation.tooltip: If checked, Donation events will trigger the message

EnableHost.label: Enable Host Events
EnableHost.tooltip: If checked, host events will trigger the message

EnableHostShoutoutHook.label: Enable Shoutout Overlay Hook for Hosts
EnableHostShoutoutHook.tooltip: If you have the Shoutout Overlay setup, this will trigger that overlay.

OpenHostShoutoutOverlayLink.label: Get the Shoutout Overlay Script
OpenHostShoutoutOverlayLink.tooltip: Opens the page to get the Shoutout Overlay script

EnableRaid.label: Enable Raid Events
EnableRaid.tooltip: If checked, raid events will trigger the message

EnableRaidShoutoutHook.label: Enable Shoutout Overlay Hook for Raids
EnableRaidShoutoutHook.tooltip: If you have the Shoutout Overlay setup, this will trigger that overlay.

OpenRaidShoutoutOverlayLink.label: Get the Shoutout Overlay Script
OpenRaidShoutoutOverlayLink.tooltip: Opens the page to get the Shoutout Overlay script
